description:
From stroller tires, to rock-hard road bike tires, a reliable floor pump is good way to keep the whole family’s bikes rolling smoothly. Tire pressure can be the difference between a great ride and one you want to forget.

  • ABS1 Pro flip chuck head threads onto both Schraeder and Presta valves and has an integrated Presta valve core wrench
  • CNC machined aluminum and steel construction
  • Ergonomic varnished wood handle
  • Easy to read 9cm gauge 0-220psi (0-15BAR)
  • Long 1.9m hose means no more spinning your tires to get that valve closer
name: Lezyne Alloy Floor Drive Pump
